item.title: How ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’ Director Jennifer Kaytin Robinson Rebooted the Millennial Cult Classic for Gen Z
item.description: “I unfortunately know that not everyone is going to like this because we took swings. What I hope is that even if you don’t like it, you can be like, ‘Huh, cool swing’,” says the director,
